name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior IT Engineer with 8 years of experience, I possess extensive expertise in **Microsoft 365**, **Azure**, **PowerShell**, **Microsoft Graph**, and **Conditional Access**. My technical abilities include managing **Intune**, **SharePoint**, **Exchange Online**, and **Teams**, ensuring robust security through tools like **Defender** and implementing **RBAC**, **OAuth**, **OIDC**, and **SAML**. I have a strong foundation in network fundamentals and a proven track record in designing and enforcing **Azure Policy** and utilizing **Microsoft Sentinel** for incident response and automation.

Additionally, I bring a background in full-stack development with experience in **React**, **Next.js**, **Node.js**, and **Django**, combined with cloud expertise in **AWS**. My experience includes developing enterprise-grade applications that incorporate AI/ML features for predictive analytics, while I ensure compliance with standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS. I have a solid understanding of CI/CD automation, microservices architecture, and event-driven systems, enhancing my ability to deliver secure and scalable IT solutions.
